subject: Re: Two spirit comm books
author: ourobouros2k2
full_text:
Let me know what you think and I will try to scoop them up as time
allows. I love vintage books, especially dealing with evp. I saw
voices from the tapes here at a local secondhand shop, I didn't have
any money to spare at the time, I think I will check back on it.

thanks
Andy

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)"
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> Today while shopping in a used bookstore I picked up a couple of books 
> having to do with spirit communication.
> The first, "Voices from the Tapes", by Peter Bander and the 
> second, "Spirit Communications for the millions", by Doris Heather 
> Buckley.
> They both look very interesting.
> 
> - Mike
>
